extendedInfo.description: Setup your favorite Love Kill Slowly logo to your phone! Love Kill Slowly 3D Live Wallpaper is an interactive wallpaper app about love. If you hate the love, you must not miss this! Logo rotates when you touch the screen. You can personalize your wallpaper by different settings: - Choose logo shape (Cube, Plate, Sphere, Disc, Pyramid)  - Choose among different background themes  - Make the logo lighted - Change logo shape dynamically by double tap Enjoy! To use: HOME/MENU/Wallpaper/Live Wallpapers/ Love Kill Slowly 3D Live Wallpaper To attempt to keep this app 100% free we have included a monetization platform. In using this app, you may see: - Notification messages including offers  - Icons on your home screen Tags: Love, Kill, Slowly, hate, 3d, live, lovely, wallpaper, logo, free, cnine
